featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for the article? (A) Mating of Flashlight Fish and Fireflies.
With the light produced by bacteria living there, they communicate with other flashlight fish to avoid getting too close to each other, so that the fish may spread out evenly to get enough food.
When night falls over the Red Sea, tiny flashlight fish rise to the surface for food, each with a pair of “headlamps,” one beneath each eye.
And if a flashlight fish is threatened by a predator, it swims away in a zigzag path, flashing its light on and off very quickly to confuse the animal pursuing it.

other.text: Flashlight fish in the Red Sea give out light at night _____.
According to the passage, NEITHER flashlight fish NOR fireflies send out light to _____.

definition.zh_def: 手電筒，一種便攜式的照明設備，通常使用電池供電。
definition.en_def: A portable handheld device that emits light, typically powered by batteries.
definition.example: I used a flashlight to find my way in the dark.
